description:
Hey HBs! We've got part 1 of Midnight Sun for you! It's Twilight from Edward's perspective! In this edition, it's Twilight except with more burning stink and 400 extra pages of Rosalie conversations, teenage inner monologues, stalking, and... paintings. What a ball! 
 Bonus Content: Mel sets the pals up for failure, we're not yucking anyone's yums!, Bella is STINKY, Edward has a hard time figuring out boners, the Cullens still suck except worse, Erin brags about her "non-existent" "gag reflex" and her friend is not impressed, and compendiums (anthologies?). Plus "War Horniness? Is that a thing?" and other intellectual exercises with Melody.
 Lady Loves: 
 Erin: 1. Scrunchies! You can wear them! They're back! 2. The https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0gugBiEkLwU (Honest Trailer for Twilight). 3. and SNL's Firelight Sketch. 
 Melody: Alanis Morrissette was the musical guest on Jimmy Fallon and performed with her toddler! 
 Episode Sponsor: IGNITE by Kim Lorraine! It's a steamy, forbidden, age-gap contemporary romance written in K. Bromberg’s Everyday Heroes World. It's out September 10th, so preorder now! 
  NEW MERCH!!!! Check out our  brand new designs as well as our charity  READ BLACK ROMANCE design. All proceeds in 2020 from that design will go to https://colorofchange.org/ (Color of Change). Rep Black romance!
